entry.title: New release for PodFetch: 4.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added more meaningful exception message when trying to create an api â€¦ by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/587
  • Added pwa support for PodFetch. by @SamTV12345 in https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/pull/589
